definition:
A ZK-EVM is understood as either:
A set of circuits that prove the execution of the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM). It is the core component of a ZK-Rollup that generates validity proofs to verify the correctness of programs.
The ZK-Rollup as a whole which offers EVM-compatible execution, and proves that execution with circuits that generate validity proofs.
